mapper.select: select r.id, r.baseline_id baselineId,r.table_name tableName,r.field_name tableName, r.name, r.rule_type ruleType, r.template_id templateId, r.monitor_obj monitorObj, r.alarm_level alarmLevel, r.alarm_receivers alarmReceivers, r.check_type checkType, r.compare_type compareType, r.content,r.output_type outputType,r.fix_value fixValue, r.range_start rangeStart, r.range_end rangeEnd,t.partition_expr partitionExpr,r.version from dqc_monitor_rule r inner join dqc_monitor_table t on r.table_name=t.table_name where r.del=0 and t.del=0 and r.baseline_id=-1 and r.status=1 and r.table_name=#{tableName}

select count(*) from dqc_monitor_baseline b inner join dqc_monitor_table t on b.id=t.baseline_id inner join dqc_monitor_rule r on b.id=r.baseline_id where b.del=0 and r.del=0 and t.del=0 and b.status=1 and r.baseline_id=1 and r.status=1 and t.table_name in (select table_name from dqc_monitor_table where table_name=#{tableName} and baseline_id != -1)
